title: Product Info - Detox & Balance - Cleansing Bar by Kalaia
description: Full ingredient list and product info for Kalaia - Detox & Balance - Cleansing Bar. A gentle and hydrating cleansing bar that combines activated charcoal...
cleaned_text: Discover alternatives in sync with your needs, budget and values. We compare, you decide. Can't find your product? Try refining your search. Kalaia Detox & Balance - Cleansing Bar What is it? They say: A gentle and hydrating cleansing bar that combines activated charcoal with papaya and ginger extracts is a perfect daily cleanser for your face and body. Activated charcoal will absorb impurities from deep within your pores to detoxify your skin while other natural ingredients work together to add vitamins, antioxidants and hydration to balance your skin for a perfect cleansing experience. A gentle and hydrating cleansing bar that combines activated charcoal with papaya and ginger extracts is a perfect daily cleanser for your face and body. Activated charcoal will absorb impurities from deep within your pores to detoxify your skin while other natural ingredients work together to add vitamins, antioxidants and hydration to balance your skin for a perfect cleansing experience. Read More Hide About the brand They say: "Kalaia, a Utah based Social Selling company, that is built with the mission to empower women around the world with an unparalleled business opportunity to become successful entrepreneurs. Kalaia combines products made with the best wholesome, natural ingredients from around the world with empowered female entrepreneurs to enrich people's lives and to enhance outward natural beauty." Full Ingredient List Sodium Palmate, Sodium Shea Butterate, Sodium Cocoate, Sodium Palm Kernelate, Glycerin, Water (Aqua, Eau), Sodium Cocoa Butterate, Citrus AurantiumDulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, LitseaCubeba Fruit Oil, Mentha Arvensis (Cornmint) Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Peel Oil, Citrus AurantiumBergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Mentha Virdis (Spearmint) Leaf Oil, Pogostemon Cabin (Patchouli) Oil, Activated Charcoal, Organic ButyrospermumParkii (Shea) Butter, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Hyaluronate, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe) Leaf Juice, Carica Extract, Sodium Gluconate, ElettariaCardamomum (Cardamom) Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract.
